page.description: The image shown when a CheckBox control option is not selected.

discussion.p: Specify the image to showwhen the item is not selected. This is usually a null image that has the same size as the *[ui:Selected image]*. Leave this option blank to use a default image. The unselected image usually only needs to be set if a custom selected image has been chosen that is is a different size than the default selected image.
